Cheltenham Festival 2015 Day 1 - Champion Hurdle Odds

The biggest race of the Festival is the Champion Hurdle on Day 1, it is many punters favourite race of the week as they look to get one over on the bookmakers early on. There is always an exciting finish to the Champion Hurdle as the 2 mile hurdlers come storming up the famous Cheltenham Hill, we always get a good winner of the race and 2015 will be no different with a top field guaranteed on Day 1 of the Festival.

It looks a very competitive race this season with Faugheen the likely favourite but the likes of The New One and Hurrricane Fly are also being well backed to run a big race.
